name: The Nun
description:
STORY

In evil unleashed you play as a journalist student who wakes to find himself in a strange new abandoned mental asylum as he progress to find the way out he uncovers the dark mysteries of that place you as the player are challenged in many different ways just to survive and search for that exit .You will experience Jump Scares in this game so be careful.

FEATURES

• In this Game you are no fighter if you want to survive the horrors of the asylum, your only chance is to run.

• Classic horror-survival style gameplay.

• Mind Blowing graphics for Android.

• Easy controls and storyline.

• Pc Game Graphics and Scary Level Design with Scary Sounds.

• Real Graphics and Scary Level Design with Scary Sounds.

• Hide and Sneak: Stealth-based gameplay, with parkour-inspired platforming elements.

• Unpredictable Enemies: Players cannot know when - and from where - one of the asylum’s terrifying inhabitants will finally catch up to them.

• Real Horror: Evil Unleashed Game settings and characters are inspired by real asylums and cases of criminal insanity.

Plug In Head Phones For Best Experience.

NOTE

You can set graphics in Settings for best performance and experience according to your device in case if its lagging.

Thank You
